metadata.title: CVE-2023-5726 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A website could have obscured the full screen notification by using thefile open dialog. This could have led to user confusion and possiblespoofing attacks. *Note: This issue only affected macOS operating systems.Other operating systems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox< 119, Firefox ESR < 115.4, and Thunderbird < 115.4.1.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
